Address.university_name: Bishkek Academy of Finance and Economics

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1994
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: International students: Oct to Feb; Feb to July; National students: Aug to Dec; Jan to May; PhD students Sept to Jan; Feb to May

Address.university_name: Meždunarodnyj Meditsinksij Universitet Avitsenna

GeneralInformation.History: Created 2017

Address.university_name: Aziatskij Meditsinskij Institut im. S.Tentiševa

GeneralInformation.History: Created 2004.
Created 2000

Address.college_name: Academy of Arts of the Kyrgyz Republic named after the Academic T.Sadykov
Address.university_name: T.Sadykov atyndagy Kyrgyz Respublikasynyn Mamlekettik Onorlor Akademiyasy

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1991.

Address.college_name: Academy of Management under the President of the Kyrgyz Republic
Address.university_name: Kyrgyz Respublikasynyn Prezidentinin aldyndagy Bashkaruu Akademiyasy (AUPKR)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992 as Biškek International School of Management and Business. In 1997 the Academy of Management was founded to consolidate the International School.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Divisions.College: Advanced Training and Retraining of Public and Municipal Servants

Divisions.Details: Toktonaliev Bishkek Financial and Economic College

Address.university_name: Borbordyk Aziyadagy Ameriki Universiteti (AUCA)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1997. In 1993, the Kyrgyz National State University Rector signed an order establishing the Kyrgyz-American Faculty (KAF) which was officially inaugurated and opened in December 1993. Acquired present name 1997.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school leaving certificate

Address.university_name: Arabaev atyndagy Kyrgyz Mamlekettik Universiteti (KSU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1945 as Women's Teacher Training College. Became Kyrgyz Women's Teacher Training Institute 1950, Kirghiz Women's Pedagogical Institute 1952, Kyrgyz State Pedagogical Institute 1992 and Kyrgyz State Pedagogical University 1994. Acquired present status and title 2005, named after Išenaly Arabaev.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Address.university_name: Biškekskij Gumanitardyk Universiteti – Bishkek Humanities University named after K.Karasaev (BGU/BHU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded in 1979 as Pedagogical Institute of Russian Language and Literature. Became State Institute of Languages ​​and Humanities 1992. Acquired present title and status 1994. A State institution.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Attestat o srednem obrazovanii) and entrance examination

Address.college_name: Diplomatic Academy of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs of the Kyrgyz Republic named after K. Dikambayev
Address.university_name: Kirgiz Respublikasinin Tişki işter ministrliginin K. Dikambaev atindagi Diplomatiyalik akademiyasi – Diplomatic Academy of the MFA of the KR

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 2001

Address.college_name: I.K. Akhunbaev Kyrgyz State Medical Academy
Address.university_name: Isa Akhunbaev atyndagy Kyrgyz Mamlekettik Medikalyk Akademiyasy

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1939. Previously known as Kyrgyz Mamlekettik Medikalyk Akademiyasy (Kyrgyz State Medical Academy).
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Address.college_name: International Academy of Management, Law, Finance and Business
Address.university_name: Meždunarodnaja Akademija Upravlenija, Prava, Finansov i Biznesa

GeneralInformation.History: Created 1930 as Frunze Cooperative Technical School, which later became Frunze Cooperative College. After the establishment of Kyrgyz Republic in 1991, Frunze Cooperative College became Bishkek Commercial and Economic College which was upgraded Kyrgyz Academy of Cooperation in 1997. Acquired current title and status in the year 2000.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary School Certificate for admission to undergraduate programmes; First higher education specialist diploma for admission to Second higher education specialist degree; Bachelor's degree for admission to Master's programmes

Address.university_name: El Aralyk Ataturk Alatoo Universiteti (ALATOO)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1996 under agreement between Governments of Turkey and Kyrgyzstan. A private institution under the Ministry of Education of the Kyrgyz Republic
AdmissionRequirements: High School or Secondary school (11 yrs) certificate and fluency in English; SAT or ACT

Address.university_name: El Aralyk Meditsinalyk Universiteti – Meždunarodnyj Meditsinskij Universitet

GeneralInformation.History: Created 2016.

Address.university_name: Meždunarodnyj universitet v Tsentral'noj Azii

GeneralInformation.History: Created 2008 offering bachelor's degree programs in seven areas (International Relations, Business Administration, Law, Information Technology, Pedagogy, Chinese and English Linguistics). In 2024, the university received a license to provide a master's degree programme in pedagogy.
GeneralInformation.AcademicYear: August to December; January to June
AdmissionRequirements: School/college certificate; ORT certificate (for Kyrgyz citizens only)

Address.university_name: Meždunarodnyj Universitet Kyrgyzstana – Kyrgyzstan El Aralyk Universiteti (IUK)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1993. Acquired present status 1995.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Divisions.College: Economics and Science in Mountain Regions

Address.college_name: Issyk-Kul State University named after K. Tynystanov
Address.university_name: Tynystanov atyndagy Issyk-Kul Mamlekettik Universiteti

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1940 as Teachers' Institute, reorganized 1953 as Prjevalsk Pedagogical Institute. Attached to Kyrgyz State University 1988. Became independent institution 1992 and acquired present status and title, named after Kasym Tynystanov, the creator of the Kyrgyz Philosophy of the Kyrgyz Republic.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Atestat o srednem obrazovanii)

Address.university_name: Jalalabat Mamlekettik Universiteti – Jalalabatski Gosudarstvenni Universitet (JASU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1993 from former Jala-Abad Pedagogical School and Zoological-Veterinary Technical School.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Address.university_name: Kyrgyz Economicalyk Universiteti (KEU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1953 as College of Soviet trade. Became Bishkek Commercial College 1991, Supreme Commercial College 1997, Bishkek State Institute of Economics and Commerce 1999 and Bishkek State University of Economics and Commerce 2003. Acquired current title 2007.

Address.college_name: Kyrgyz National Agrarian University named after K.I. Skriabin
Address.university_name: Skyabin atyndagy Agrardyk Universiteti (KNAU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1933.

Divisions.College: Technology of Production and Processing of Agricultural Products
Kyrgyz Veterinary Medicine named Arstanbek Duisheeva

Address.college_name: Kyrgyz National University named after Jusup Balasagyn
Address.university_name: Jusup Balasagyn atyndagy Kyrgyz Uluttuk Universiteti (KSNU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1932 as Kyrgyz State Pedagogical Institute. Became Kyrgyz State University 1951 and Kyrgyz State National University 1993. Acquired present title 2002.
AdmissionRequirements: Competitive entrance examination following general or special secondary school certificate

Address.college_name: Kyrgyz State Academy of Physical Education and Sports
Address.university_name: Kyrgyz Mamlekettik Dene Tarbiya jana Sport Akademia

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1955.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate

Address.college_name: Kyrgyz State Technical University named after I. Razzakov
Address.university_name: Razzakov atyndagy Kyrgyz Mamlekettik Technikalyk Universiteti (KSTU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1954 as Frunze Polytechnic Institute. Acquired present title 1995.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate and entrance examination

Divisions.College: Mining and Mining Techonolgies named after Usengazy Asanaliev

Address.college_name: Kyrgyz-Russian Slavic University named after the First President of Russian Federation B.N. Yeltsin
Address.university_name: Respublikasynyn Prezidentinin aldyndagy Bashkaruu Akademiyasy Kyrgyz-Orus Slavyan Universiteti (KRSU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1992 by the Treaty of Friendship, Cooperation and Mutual Assistance between the Russian Federation and the Republic of Kyrgyzstan as the Kyrgyz-Russian Slavic University. Acquired present title 2004.

Address.university_name: Kyrgyz-Ozbek Universiteti – Osh State Social University (KUU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1994. Acquired present status 1997.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Attestat o Srednem Obrazovanii)

Address.university_name: Kyrgyz-Turk Manas Universiteti (KTMU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1995.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate and entrance examination

Address.university_name: Naryn Mamlekettik Universiteti (NSU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1996.
AdmissionRequirements: Attestat o Srednem Obrazovanii

Address.university_name: (OSCE Academy)

GeneralInformation.History: Created in 2002 as a public foundation following the signing of an MoU between the OSCE and the government of the Kyrgyz Republic. The Academy is a regional centre of higher education and a forum for regional security dialogue and research.
AdmissionRequirements: High-school certificate; Undergraduate degree

Address.university_name: Ošskij Gosudarstvennyj Universiteti (OshGu/OSU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1951 as Oš State Pedagogical Institute. Acquired present status and title 1992.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Atestat o srednem obrazovanii) or foreign equivalent

Address.college_name: Osh Technological University named after M.M. Adyshev
Address.university_name: Adyshev atyndagy Osh Technologiya Universiteti (OshTU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1996 on the basis of Osh Higher Technological College (formerly Faculty of Technical Sciences of the Frunze Polytechnic Institute, 1963).
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Attestat o srednem obrazovanii) and entrance examination

Address.university_name: Talas Mamlekettit Universiteti (TSU)

GeneralInformation.History: Founded 1996. Acquired present status 2000.
AdmissionRequirements: Secondary school certificate (Attestat o srednem obrazovanii)
